title: FaceMatrix
author: FaceMatrix
content: Hey everyone, I'm a gift card reseller who's trying to find long-term buyers capable of buying in large amounts on a recurring basis.Please do not contact me if you are only trying to buy a one time gift card of any value, I'm looking strictly for individuals who are looking to establish a long term business.I'm only accepting BTC or WISE payments as of right now.Cards for sale:Amazon USA gift cards: 85% BTC/WiseAmazon Germany gift cards: 80% BTC/WiseAmazon UK gift cards: 80% BTC/WisePrices are negotiable. Please message me on Telegram @realek or contact me via email: johnhenn1997@gmail.com if you are interested.
